mw-license-commercial-use: This software and derivatives may be used for commercial purposes.
mw-license-patent-use-yes: This license provides an express grant of patent rights from contributors.
mw-license-patent-use-no: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant any rights in the patents of contributors.
mw-license-private-use: This software may be used and modified in private.
mw-license-disclose-source: Source code must be made available when the software is distributed.
mw-license-license-and-copyright-notice: A copy of the license and copyright notice must be included with the software.
mw-license-network-use-is-distribution: Users who interact with the software via network are given the right to receive a copy of the source code.
mw-license-same-license: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the software. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.
mw-license-same-license-file: Modifications of existing files must be released under the same license when distributing the software. In some cases a similar or related license may be used.
mw-license-same-license-library: Modifications must be released under the same license when distributing the software. In some cases a similar or related license may be used, or this condition may not apply to works that use the software as a library.
mw-license-state-changes: Changes made to the code must be documented.
mw-license-liability: This license includes a limitation of liability.
mw-license-trademark-use: This license explicitly states that it does NOT grant trademark rights, even though licenses without such a statement probably do not grant any implicit trademark rights.
mw-license-warranty: The license explicitly states that it does NOT provide any warranty.
mw-license-none-content: Я считаю, что это произведение опубликовано под свободной лицензией, либо юридически находится в общественном достоянии. Я понимаю, что если я своевременно не укажу необходимую информацию о лицензировании, файл может быть удалён.
